00091 /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00092     FUNCTION: overlap_demo()
00093      PURPOSE: Demo of overlapping windows
00094  DESCRIPTION: -
00095      RETURNS: nothing
00096      HISTORY: 920217 V0.1
00097 --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00098 void overlap_demo()
00099 {
00100   WINDOW *w1;
00101   WINDOW *w2;
00102   WINDOW *w3;
00103   WINDOW *w4;
00104 
00105   w1 = wn_open(_SINGLE_LINE,10,10,10,10,
00106                16*YELLOW+GREEN,16*YELLOW+GREEN);
00107   wn_printf(w1,"Window 1\n");
00108 
00109   getch();
00110   w2 = wn_open(_DOUBLE_LINE,12,12,10,10,
00111                16*RED+GREEN,16*RED+GREEN);
00112   wn_printf(w2,"Window 2\n");
00113 
00114   getch();
00115   w3 = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,14,14,10,10,
00116                16*BLUE+GREEN,16*BLUE+GREEN);
00117   wn_printf(w3,"Window 3\n");
00118 
00119   getch();
00120   w4 = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,16,16,10,10,
00121                16*CYAN+YELLOW,16*CYAN+YELLOW);
00122   wn_printf(w4,"Window 4\n");
00123 
00124 
00125   wn_printf(w1,"Window 1\n");
00126   getch();
00127   wn_printf(w2,"Window 2\n");
00128   getch();
00129   wn_printf(w3,"Window 3\n");
00130   getch();
00131   wn_printf(w4,"Window 4\n");
00132   getch();
00133 
00134   wn_printf(w4,"Window 4\n");
00135   getch();
00136   wn_printf(w3,"Window 3\n");
00137   getch();
00138   wn_printf(w2,"Window 2\n");
00139   getch();
00140   wn_printf(w1,"Window 1\n");
00141   getch();
00142 
00143   w4 = wn_close(w4);
00144   getch();
00145   w3 = wn_close(w3);
00146   getch();
00147   w2 = wn_close(w2);
00148   getch();
00149   w1 = wn_close(w1);
00150 }

00152 /*#+func--------------------------------------------------------------
00153     FUNCTION: call_zapload()
00154      PURPOSE: Call the zapload utilitie.
00155  DESCRIPTION: -
00156      RETURNS: nothing
00157      HISTORY: 911211 V0.1 - Initial version
00158 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00159 void call_zapload(void);
00160 void call_zapload()
00161 {
00162   char command_str[80];
00163   WINDOW *w;
00164 
00165   /*----------------------------
00166     Open standard DOS window
00167   -----------------------------*/
00168   w = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
00169               16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
00170 
00171   sprintf(command_str,"zapload");
00172   system(command_str);
00173   puts("\n\nPress any key to continue ...");
00174   getch();
00175 
00176   w = wn_close(w);
00177 }
00178

00226   sprintf(command_str,"%s","procomm");

00228 
00229   w = wn_close(w);

00245 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
00246 |    FUNCTION: exit_prog()
00247 |     PURPOSE: exit from program
00248 | DESCRIPTION: Perform this function only once:
00249 |              exit from frontend processor,
00250 |              update system files,
00251 |              close window enviroment and
00252 |              call exit().
00253 |     RETURNS: nothing
00254 |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.3
00255 ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00256 void exit_prog()
00257 {
00258    static int done = FALSE;
00259 
00260   if (!done)               /* Do this only once */
00261   {
00262     wn_exit();          /* Exit from HvA window enviroment          */
00263     done = TRUE;        /* Set flag (this routine has been executed */
00264   }
00265 }

00281

00285 #endif
00286 
00287   wn_dialog(13,40,1,menu,6,
00288     "       WINDOW TEST        ",
00289     "                          ",
00290     "                          ",
00291     "  (c) H.B.J. van Asselt   ",
00292     "      12 OCT 1993         ",
00293     "");
00294 
00295 #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)

00298 #endif

00301 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
00302 |    FUNCTION: initialize()
00303 |     PURPOSE: Initialize window enviroment
00304 | DESCRIPTION: initialize variables,
00305 |              prints introduction screen,
00306 |     RETURNS:
00307 |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.3
00308 ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00309 void initialize()
00310 {
00311   extern char *default_subject;
00312 
00313   /*----------------------------------------------
00314     Set vector to exit_prog() if exit() is called
00315   ------------------------------------------------*/
00316   atexit(exit_prog);
00317 
00318   /*----------------------------
00319     Initilize (graphic) screen
00320   ----------------------------*/
00321   wn_init();
00322 
00323 #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
00324   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
00325   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
00326 #endif
00327 
00328   /*-------------------------------
00329     Initialize help file functions
00330   ---------------------------------*/
00331   default_subject = ":general_info";
00332   init_help("window");
00333 
00334 #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
00335   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
00336   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
00337 #endif
00338 
00339   /*-------------------
00340     Show intro screen
00341   --------------------*/
00342   /*
00343   intro_screen();
00344   */
00345 
00346   /*-------------------------------------
00347     Initialize function key's functions
00348   --------------------------------------*/
00349   /*
00350   init_funkey(F2,call_zapload,"Zapload");
00351   init_funkey(F3,call_hexconv,"HEXconv");
00352   init_funkey(F4,call_terminal,"Terminal");
00353   init_funkey(F10,OS_shell,"SHELL");
00354   disp_funkeys(1);
00355   */
00356 }

00358 /*#+func--------------------------------------------------------------
00359     FUNCTION: do_dir()
00360      PURPOSE: Show directory
00361  DESCRIPTION: Asks for a filemask and shows directory
00362               If edit window was escaped with ESC, don't show the
00363               directory
00364      RETURNS: nothing
00365      HISTORY: 911211 V0.1 - Initial version
00366 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00367 void do_dir(void)
00368 {
00369   char filemask[20];
00370   int ret;
00371 
00372   strcpy(filemask,"*.*");
00373   ret = editstr(action_row+2,action_col+2,20,"Enter file mask",filemask,_DRAW);
00374   if (ret != ESC)
00375     get_dir(filemask,filemask);
00376 }
00377 
00378 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
00379 |    FUNCTION: main()
00380 |     PURPOSE: main programm
00381 | DESCRIPTION: -
00382 |     RETURNS: nothing
00383 |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.1 - Initial version
00384 ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00385 int main()
00386 {
00387   int choise;
00388   char s[80];
00389   int i;
00390 
00391   initialize();
00392 
00393 #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
00394   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
00395   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
00396 #endif
00397 
00398   do
00399   {
00400     choise = pulldown(heads,0,":general_info");
00401   }
00402   while (choise != ESC);
00403 
00404   /*--------------------
00405     Exit this programm
00406   ---------------------*/
00407 #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
00408   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
00409   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
00410 #endif
00411 
00412   exit(0);
00413   return(0);
00414 }
